name: Task2_3 - Select data from dataflow ingestion

content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT TOP 100
    jsonContent
	, JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.documents[0].sentiment') as Sentiment
	, JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.documents[0].id') as CustomerID

FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK (
            'https://asadatalake801100.dfs.core.windows.net/dev/bronze/sentiment/data_0ec6d383-a91d-4d74-8232-858c78e82504_1593c6d6-d702-4eee-aa35-1a875221c692.json',
			'https://asadatalake801100.dfs.core.windows.net/dev/bronze/sentiment/data_15aad353-9b46-448d-8cbc-13d8e58b8bde_33e89105-c7ff-48a6-ae5b-5208c38156f0.json',
			'https://asadatalake801100.dfs.core.windows.net/dev/bronze/sentiment/data_1c83f93a-cdee-4154-9fe9-788e101b9f22_151bcaab-4a7d-4f18-ba64-f5e89450e6f7.json',
			'https://asadatalake801100.dfs.core.windows.net/dev/bronze/sentiment/data_227ff5f2-c1b4-4f60-9356-0935b4705bb5_da368c6a-2392-442c-b6fc-f09c583ea85e.json',
			'https://asadatalake801100.dfs.core.windows.net/dev/bronze/sentiment/data_38d2a272-6392-4204-8754-f039ed49f80f_9a9a8bb8-406c-4102-a040-54d4b0d189e1.json',
			'https://asadatalake801100.dfs.core.windows.net/dev/bronze/sentiment/data_44614e4c-1064-421f-b8a4-8be067a78bcb_999cccde-307d-45da-8edc-1475af3bb4dc.json',
			'https://asadatalake801100.dfs.core.windows.net/dev/bronze/sentiment/data_5befafb4-2d44-4de7-966f-b1c00100e79f_b6b1e999-652e-459b-8be2-36b820b6a64e.json',
			'https://asadatalake801100.dfs.core.windows.net/dev/bronze/sentiment/data_5c473150-2cb9-4e07-85e6-80e7e12bc821_af6990e2-280f-4e0b-9342-2fa1184c82c8.json',
			'https://asadatalake801100.dfs.core.windows.net/dev/bronze/sentiment/data_6e593ce3-aae4-4cc4-91a1-8fd1990b0316_695eb213-7f22-48ac-afb9-87ccee9f1248.json',
			'https://asadatalake801100.dfs.core.windows.net/dev/bronze/sentiment/data_91fb535f-4c8e-41b4-873c-1ccb558b66a0_0920f156-74ae-4492-8a8e-6f5d31281edd.json',
			'https://asadatalake801100.dfs.core.windows.net/dev/bronze/sentiment/data_b1f84658-0a0f-44bd-a511-93439a70872f_30843c81-8bac-4d87-9e52-fcc9a60d4b4e.json',
			'https://asadatalake801100.dfs.core.windows.net/dev/bronze/sentiment/data_b6cc8a16-6d99-4f77-8d34-31f94adf6345_8bb443a2-00e3-4602-827f-c0ecbad85291.json',
			'https://asadatalake801100.dfs.core.windows.net/dev/bronze/sentiment/data_c52d5650-6156-44f6-9e04-0abfb1d867ad_949c7b8e-0822-4c0c-adeb-222426e459c1.json',
			'https://asadatalake801100.dfs.core.windows.net/dev/bronze/sentiment/data_d9a012d4-95a9-4941-8d8a-28c54da991d7_221b877a-b9b8-4bd2-b48b-e8ce129bd2a5.json',
			'https://asadatalake801100.dfs.core.windows.net/dev/bronze/sentiment/data_e10e6396-95e6-4751-8412-888f6ed1f79a_f768dbcf-5435-47a6-b8ff-6fd06efa341d.json',
			'https://asadatalake801100.dfs.core.windows.net/dev/bronze/sentiment/data_e540a339-093e-4c88-b6f0-dec950bf7de2_2575c329-f8fc-4b9c-b1ff-291d1fa71e24.json',
			'https://asadatalake801100.dfs.core.windows.net/dev/bronze/sentiment/data_e9efef1f-b519-43fd-9d83-1fcb65b60b06_c0fcdf06-f361-490a-a76a-bf2ae1d36eb0.json',
			'https://asadatalake801100.dfs.core.windows.net/dev/bronze/sentiment/data_fb5695ea-b354-4608-b951-8cf4d1a6bca1_57157af1-a7c5-4933-852a-250e0f0941bc.json'
        ),
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS [result]
